title: "Could not connect to HTTP server..." when LoL is installed on D:/ disc | Windows
body: Anyone knows why this issue occurs when LoL is installed not on C:/ disc? As soon as I put LoL to C:/ disc I CAN launch and play the game but I WANT it to be located on D:/ disc and can't find the solution for this issue.

replies.body:
Did you make sure to add [**Firewall exceptions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) for League after installing it on your D:\ Drive? League often runs into issues when not installed on the same drive as your OS, so if those exceptions don't work out, you may have to reinstall League on your C:\ Drive.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
